EDIT.TITLE: Edit Product
EDIT.SUBTITLE: You are editing the product:
EDIT.TOOLTIP_IT: You are editing the Italian version. Changes to name, description, and specifications will be saved for this language. If you want to change language go back to the previous page and select the desired language.
EDIT.TOOLTIP_EN: You are editing the English version. Changes to name, description, and specifications will be saved for this language. If you want to change language go back to the previous page and select the desired language.
